fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- At night, visit a player, collecting an ingredient from them.
- At night, you may instead Serve a player your food, which costs one ingredient. If you serve food to a Corporate player, you see their disgusted reaction. If you serve it to a non-Corporate player, they love it.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You can only have one ingredient at a time.
- If you collect an ingredient from an evil player, when you use it to make food, you will get the opposite reaction of what would normally happen (ie: commoner will be disgusted, corporate will love it).
